statements: DELETE FROM labeled_images WHERE label = 'cat' AND created_at > '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM labeled_images WHERE id = 100 AND label = 'cat';
DELETE FROM neural_networks WHERE optimizer = 'adam' AND layers > 5;
DELETE FROM image_labels WHERE image_id = 1 AND label_id = 1;
DELETE FROM images WHERE image_id = 100 AND label = 'Example';
DELETE FROM image_labels WHERE label_id = 10 AND image_id = (SELECT image_id FROM images WHERE label = 'Test' ORDER BY image_id DESC LIMIT 1);
DELETE FROM image_metadata WHERE width > 100 AND format = 'JPEG';
